executives.name: Edward Houghton
executives.customer_note: Edward Houghton is listed as one of the owners of Essence of Humboldt LLC.

evidence.value: Edward Houghton is listed as one of the business owners for Essence of Humboldt LLC on their cannabis license.

executives.name: Richard Houghton
executives.customer_note: Richard Houghton is listed as one of the owners of Essence of Humboldt LLC.

evidence.value: Richard Houghton is listed as one of the business owners for Essence of Humboldt LLC on their cannabis license.
Richard Houghton is listed as a co-owner of Essence of Humboldt LLC, Humboldt Distribution Company, and The Cannavise Group on his LinkedIn profile.

website_info.summary: Essence of Humboldt LLC is a cannabis manufacturing company located in Eureka, California that produces high-quality cannabis concentrates. The company is estimated to have annual revenue of around $1.19 million.
website_info.infomration_about_the_team: The company is owned by Edward Houghton and Richard Houghton, but I was unable to find any additional information about other company executives or decision makers.
